summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of College Street between Thirty-first Avenue South and Thirty-fourth Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, all in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 47066 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
